name: Giuseppe De Giacomo
content: Giuseppe De Giacomo - Home Page Giuseppe De Giacomo http://www.diag.uniroma1.it/degiacomo Full professor (professore ordinario) at Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica e Gestionale, Facoltï¿½ di Ingegneria dell'Informazione, Informatica e Statistica, Sapienza Universita' di Roma De Giacomo, Giuseppe Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica e Gestionale Sapienza Universita' di Roma Via Ariosto 25 00185 Roma, Italy Tel: +39 06 77274010 (int. 35010) Fax: +39 06 77274002 Email: "degiacomo(at)diag.uniroma1.it" WWW: http://www.diag.uniroma1.it/degiacomo Research My field is Artificial Intelligence. My main research area is Knowledge Representation and Automated Reasoning. I contributed to several topics in Artificial Intelligence and Computer Science, including Description Logics, Ontologies, Data Management, View-based Query Processing, Data Integration, Reasoning about Actions, Situation Calculus, Generalized forms of AI Planning, Cognitive Robotics, AI-based Manufacturing, Smart Spaces and Internet of Things, Business Process Modeling, Verification and Synthesis of KR-based systems, Logics of Programs, Temporal Logics, Fixpoint Logics, Service Composition and Integration, Data-Aware Process Modeling and Analysis. I am AAAI Fellow, ACM Fellow, and EurAI Fellow. I am an invited speaker at FloC 2026 I have been invited speaker at IJCAI 2019 I have been Program Chair of ECAI 2020 I am in the board of EurAI I am in the board of AIxIA I have been awarded an ERC Advanced Grant for the project ERC AdG WhiteMech 2019-2025. I was involved in EU-ICT-48 TAILOR as the work-package leader of WP5: Deciding and Learning How to Act I am involved in Italian AI PhD program PhD-AI.it I am involved in EurAI European Summer School on AI Series: ESSAI Papers - DBLP - Google Scholar Teaching (partially in Italian)
